msItemStruct.note: Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology collection

supportDesc.support: 4.1 X 8.4cm. Fragment torn on all sides with minor scattered holes throughout.

provenance.p: Excavated by Grenfell and Hunt (1903) on behalf of the Egyptian Exploration Fund, and donated to the University Museum in return for its support (1907, Dr. Parrish Collection).

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

listBibl.bibl: P. Oxy. 4.775 John R. Abercrombie, “The University Museum’s Collection of Papyri and Related Materials,” Expedition 20.2 (Winter 1978): 32-37. Victor Bérard, trans., ed., L’Odyssée: Tome 1. Société D’Édition, Les Belles Lettres, Paris: 1924. Victor Bérard, Introduction A L’Odyssée: Tome 1. Société D’Édition, Les Belles Lettres, Paris: 1924. George Melville Bolling, The External Evidence for Interpolation in Homer. Clarendon Press, Oxford: 1925. R. D. Dawe, The Odyssey: Translation and Analysis. The Book Guild Ltd, Sussex, England: 1993. Peter von der Mühll, Homerus Odyssea. K. G. Saur Verlag GmbH, München und Leipzig: 2005. Stephanie West, trans., ed., Homer’s Odyssey: Volume 1. 1981.
